department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Self Propelled Howitzer Price and Availability
description: A notice issued to request information from interested parties regarding the purchase of a self-propelled howitzer. The procurement process will be competitive and open to all interested bidders. The contract will be conducted in a single-stage procurement process and will be awarded based on the lowest price offered. The self-propelled howitzer is a type of artillery weapon that is used for a wide range of military purposes.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
**Solicitation Number:** WS4549743544
**Publication Date:** 2024-04-25
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-05-16 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

## Project Overview
This solicitation is for the procurement of Self-Propelled Howitzers. The project aims to secure the availability and pricing of these artillery systems for the Department of National Defence.

## Government Contracting Entity
* **Constituting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Location:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

## Application Information
* **Notice Type:** Request for Information (RFI)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **UNSPSC Classification:** Self-propelled artillery (25102003)
* **Contracting Entity Contact:** Darren Langdon (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ **Email:** darren.langdon@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19518749?extsite=MTk1MTg3NDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Terms and Conditions
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** TBD
* **Estimated Contract End Date:** 2024-04-22
* **Geographic Regions:**
	+ **Supply Regions:** Canada
	+ **Delivery Regions:** Canada
